Class EngineDto

java.lang.Object
fr.istic.aco.editor.engine.EngineDto
public class EngineDto extends Object
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing the state of the editor engine. This object is used to encapsulate and transfer engine state information, including buffer content, clipboard content, selection indices, and memento information.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • EngineDto

      public EngineDto(int mementoIndex, EngineImpl engine, int lastMementoIndex)
      Constructs an EngineDto using the given engine state.
      Parameters:
      mementoIndex - the current memento index.
      engine - the engine from which the state is extracted. Must not be null.
      lastMementoIndex - the index of the last memento in the editor's history.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the provided engine is null.
